ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He neither affirmed the truth nor did he do salat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For he neither believed nor prayed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But he did not verify the Truth, nor did he observe Prayer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The human being does not want to believe the Truth, nor does he want to pray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Neither did he believe it to be true, nor did he offer the prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, he neither believed nor prayed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So he did not accept the truth, nor did he pray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: For he confirmed it not, and did not pray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For he neither trusted, nor prayed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He neither confirmed [the messages of Allah], nor did he pray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So he gave nothing in charity, nor did he pray!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So he (the disbeliever) neither believed (in this Quran, in the Message of Muhammad SAW) nor prayed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Because, he neither believed nor prayed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:31] For he, man, neither affirmed [the truth] nor prayed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For he) i.e. Abu Jahl (neither trusted) neither believed in Allah's divine Oneness, (nor prayed) nor embraced Islam and became of those who perform the prayer.
